English:
This is Kamishiro's underground facility?
Yuuko's really in here somewhere?
Chinese:
這裡就是神代的地下設施……？
小悠子真的在這……
Korean:
여기가, 카미시로의 지하시설…?
정말로, 여기에 유콧치가…
German:
Das hier ist das unterirdische Labor von
Kamishiro? Und Yuuko ist hier irgendwo?

English:
There's a faint signal from the Royal Knights.
This is it, without a doubt!
Chinese:
雖然很微弱，但是這裡有皇家騎士的反應。
應該是這裡沒錯。
Korean:
미약하지만 로얄 나이츠의 반응이 있어
여기가 틀림없는 것 같아
German:
Ich empfange ein schwaches Signal der Royal
Knights. Ihr seid zweifelsohne richtig.

English:
Huh?!
Hey, over there!
Chinese:
嗯……！？
喂、喂～那個是！！
Korean:
……응!?
저, 저기, 저거!!
German:
Huch?!
He, da drüben!

English: Yuuko!
Chinese: 悠子大人！！
Korean: 유코 씨!!
German: Yuuko!

English: So you've come...
Chinese: 來了嗎……
Korean: 왔나…
German: Da seid ihr also ...

English:
Y-You step away from Yuuko, right this instant!
You're not going to get away with this!
Chinese:
現、現、現在立刻離開小悠子！
才不會讓妳稱心如意！
Korean:
지지지금 바로 유콧치에게서 떨어져!
네 생각대로 하게 내버려 두진 않을 거야!
German:
Du da, sofort weg von Yuuko!
Damit wirst du nicht durchkommen!

English: Heehee... I'm afraid I don't follow you.
Chinese: 呵呵呵……我辦不到。
Korean: 후후후… 그건 안 되겠는걸
German: Hihi ... Ich fürchte, ich verstehe nicht ganz.

English:
At last, the source of the calamity. Well, we can
eliminate these filthy humans once and for all.
Chinese:
因為我終於可以消除禍害的元兇……
骯髒的人類們。
Korean:
이로써 드디어 재앙의 원흉을…
더러운 인간들을 없애 버릴 수 있으니까 말이야
German:
Da haben wir endlich den Ursprung der Katastrophe.
Wir können diese lausigen Menschen ein für alle
Mal ausradieren.

English:
We're here now, and there's no way you're getting
away with that!
Chinese:
既然我們來了，
就絕對不會讓妳得逞！
Korean:
우리들이 온 이상
절대로 그런 짓을 하게 내버려 두지 않겠어!
German:
Jetzt sind wir hier, und wir werden das nicht
zulassen!

English:
We already know you're being manipulated by the
Royal Knights!
Chinese:
我們已經知道
妳是受到皇家騎士的操縱！
Korean:
네가 로얄 나이츠에게 조종당하고 있다는 건
이미 알고 있다고!
German:
Wir wissen schon, dass du von den Royal Knights
manipuliert wirst!

English:
I don't care if it's what King Drasil wants or not, there's no way I'm letting you destroy 
humanity!
Chinese:
我不知道什麼世界樹的意志啦。
但居然要毀滅人類，開什麼玩笑！
Korean:
위그드라실의 의지인지 뭔지 모르겠지만
인간을 없앤다니 웃기지 말라고!
German:
Ist mir total egal, was König Drasil will. Ich
lasse nicht zu, dass du die Menschheit
vernichtest!

English: Heh... Omnimon's put you up to this.
Chinese: 哼……是奧米加獸出的主意嗎……？
Korean: 훗… 오메가몬의 훈수인가…
German: Hihi ... Omnimon hat dich wohl dazu angestiftet.

English:
Omnimon... You're as much of a fool as these
failures of human beings are.
Chinese:
奧米加獸……
你的愚蠢程度不下於這裡的人類。
Korean:
오메가몬…
네놈은 여기에 있는 인간들 못지않게 어리석구나
German:
Omnimon ... Du bist genauso ein Narr wie diese
nichtsnutzigen Menschen.

English:
To support humans, and to turn your back on the
nobler ideals...
Chinese: 竟然去幫助人類之流，違背崇高的意志。
Korean: 인간 따위의 편에 들어서, 숭고한 의지에 등지다니
German:
Dass du sie unterstützt und höhere Werte
verwirfst ...

English:
What?!
You... It can't be!
German:
Wie?!
Du ... unmöglich!

English:
Nokia, be careful!
This woman... She is not human!
Chinese:
諾奇雅，小心點。
這個女的……不是人類！
Korean:
노키아, 조심해
이 여자…… 인간이 아니야!
German:
Vorsicht, Nokia!
Diese Frau ... ist kein Mensch!

English: What do you mean by that? That Kishibe is--
Chinese: 這、這是怎麼一回事？　岸部她——
Korean: 무, 무슨 소리야? 그럼 키시베는―
German: Was soll das heißen? Diese Kishibe ist ...

English:
Heehee... Heeheeheehee...
Hee... Bwahahaha!
Chinese:
呵呵呵……呵呵呵呵呵……
呵呵……喔哈哈哈哈——！
Korean:
후후후…… 후후후후훗……
후후…… 쿠하하하핫――!
German:
Hihi ... Hihihi ...
Hi ... Muahahaha!

English:
Huh?!
Wh-Wh-What? There's something strange going on...
Chinese:
！？
什、什麼？她看起來……
Korean:
!?
뭐, 뭐야? 왠지 상태가…
German:
Wie?!
W-W-Was? Irgendwas geht hier vor sich ...

English:
Finally, finally... this moment has come!
None shall hinder me! As if they ever could!
Chinese:
終於、終於……這一刻終於來了！
我不會讓任何人妨礙我的！休想！
Korean:
드디어, 드디어… 이 때가 왔다!
그 누구도 방해하게 두진 않겠다! 둘까 보냐!
German:
Endlich, endlich ist es so weit!
Niemand wird mich aufhalten!
Es wäre auch niemandem möglich gewesen!

English: This is bad! She means to start the plan!
Chinese: 糟糕！那傢伙打算開始實行計畫！
Korean: 위험해! 녀석은 벌써 계획을 시작할 셈이야!
German: Das ist nicht gut! Sie will den Plan umsetzen!

English:
It's too late!
Open, Door of Judgment!
Chinese:
已經太遲了！
開始吧！“審判之門”呀，開啟吧！
Korean:
이미 늦었어!
자! "심판의 문"이여, 열려라―!
German:
Zu spät!
Öffne dich, Tor der Abrechnung!
